channel.title: Weird error need help!
channel.description:
hi i get this error and i have never seen this before could someone please tell me how to fix it.
[4/18/13 6:38 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour ce) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno wn Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:133) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: c onnect [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect0(Native Method) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(Unknown Source) [4/18/13 6:38 AM]: ... 12 more Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Weird error need help!
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

let me guess…you was adding voting/highscores?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error need help!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Well I’m not sure, Google the error. I think it’s a problem to do with a setting on your PC, not the server though.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error need help!
item.dc:creator: @dracoboy89 dracoboy89
item.description:
@dracoboy89 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:2, topic:517123”]I think it’s your firewall, try disabling/adding Java to your allowed list on your firewall. Let me know how that goes for you.
If you want to look it up for yourself and see if you can find an answer yourself google java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection[/quote]

i looked and my java is accepted. I also looked at my port-forwarding and that is also good

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error need help!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I think it’s your firewall, try disabling/adding Java to your allowed list on your firewall. Let me know how that goes for you.
If you want to look it up for yourself and see if you can find an answer yourself google java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection

Read full topic
